price: I kad bi vidjeli da komad neba pada, rekli bi: “Oblaci nagomilani.”
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina al-samāi sāqiṭan yaqūlū saḥābun markūmun
